subject: VAM Pros Disconnecting
description_text:
Hello,

I’m running the VAM Pros through simhub and they work for 15-20 minutes
then disconnect and there’s a constant low vibration that happens after
they stop working. I’ve tried to reflash the firmware for my pro x ultra
control box but no changes. Could you assist?

Thank you,

Mike Jones
302-632-7045

conversations.body_text: Hi Mike Jones,    Please connect the USB directly to the blue USB 3.0 port on the back of your computer and avoid using a USB hub.  Meanwhile, uninstall version 2.1.0 from your computer and install version 2.1.1 using the link we provided to update the firmware. Follow these steps:      Open the software and go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update  Select the file pedals-firmware-pedals-proxultra.sfu  After the update, test the pedals again         If you still encounter any issues, please feel free to contact us.

Thank you for the info. I do not see the link to update the firmware in the
email

Mike Jones
302-632-7045


On Sun, Sep 14, 2025 at 8:27 PM support@simsonn.com

Thank you. Should the box be in upgrade mode when I do the manual update?

Mike Jones
302-632-7045


On Sun, Sep 14, 2025 at 8:48 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Mike Jones,  If Simsonn Manager already shows the device as connected, there’s no need to manually enter recovery mode—you can proceed with the update directly.
